text: Mechanics of the Brain () is a 1926 Soviet documentary movie directed by Vsevolod Pudovkin.Маленькая практика стоит большой теорииМЕХАНИКА ГОЛОВНОГО МОЗГА (1926) == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1926 movies Category:Soviet movies Category:Documentary movies Category:Movies directed by Vsevolod Pudovkin
